description: This table stores order and scheduling info for active and historical therapy protocols.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LINKED_OTP_ID
columns.description: Identifiers for order templates (OTP) present in this plan.

columns.name: SESS_INTER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value representing the plan level interval of an order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Every visit


Weekly


Every two weeks


Monthly


Quarterly


PRN


Once


Every three weeks


Every four weeks


Every five weeks


Every six weeks


Twice per week


Three times per week


Selected dates


Selected treatments


Daily


Every eight weeks

columns.name: SESS_INIT_CNT
columns.description: Planned treatment count for an order scheduled for a fixed number of treatments.

columns.name: TX_ORD_RELEASE_CNT
columns.description: The number of times an order has been generated from the associated order template (OTP).

columns.name: SESS_START_DATE
columns.description: Stores the first date on which treatment with the associated order is planned (user entered or calculated from a relative offset in the protocol).

columns.name: ORDER_CAT
columns.description: Category associated with the general type of order.

columns.name: ORDER_ADDED_DTTM
columns.description: Instant at which this order was added to the plan.

columns.name: SESS_ORDER_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of the order template.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Signed


Removed


Completed

columns.name: LAST_RELEASE_DTTM
columns.description: Instant at which the linked order template was last released as an order.

columns.name: LAST_RELEASE_ORD_ID
columns.description: Identifier for the order (ORD) created on the last release of this order template.

columns.name: MIN_TREAT_SEP
columns.description: The minimum number of days expected between treatments with the affected order.

columns.name: TREAT_DIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the initial treatment distribution type.  This item determines how a treatment is distributed from a chosen interval.  If weekly is the chosen interval, only two distribution types are available for selection: any day or specific days.  If any day is selected, then user's value in interval details description determine how many times a week this treatment is to be released.  If specific days is selected, interval details description displays which days are selected. If another interval type is chosen, then other treatment distribution types are available.  Currently this category only has items supporting a weekly interval.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Any Day


Specific Days


Specific Day of Month


Specific Day of Week

columns.name: INTER_DETAILS_DESC
columns.description: Stores information on how treatments are distributed in a specified interval.

columns.name: DUE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the next due date of the linked order.

columns.name: OTP_DISPLAY_SEQ
columns.description: Stores the display order of an order template (OTP) within the therapy plan.

columns.name: OTP_GROUP_PRL_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the protocol contact that this order was associated with for grouping purpose.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: Stores the end date for an order after which the order should be completed.

columns.name: DEFAULT_SELECTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the default selection status of the order during ordering workflow.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sign


Remove

columns.name: ORDER_GROUP_CSN
columns.description: Stores the source order group contact serial number (CSN) from where the order came from.

columns.name: ORDER_GROUP_NUM
columns.description: Stores a unique number for orders that came from the same order group.

columns.name: ORDER_GROUP_DFLT_SELECTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the default selection status of the order group during ordering workflow.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DEFAULT_SELECTION_C_NAME
